attributes.title: Bad app
attributes.review: This app took forever to download and made my phone crash multiple times. I wanted to see the information on trump and everything but I couldn’t open the app 😡. I do not recommend this app

attributes.title: Corrupt App
attributes.review: This app took forever to download! Luckily I passed the time watching Fox News but when I finally got it to work I noticed some very SUSPICIOUS activity. I think this app is a fake ploy by the Chinese, Russian, and North Korean government to gather our information! If you love America do not download it!

attributes.title: WROST APP EVER
attributes.review: when I opened this app it was terrifying. There was like a rotten orange🍊 and tan Patrick star ⭐️had a baby 👶 🤮. But anyways, it was super slow and kept crashing every 5 seconds and it messed up my phone so much. Never get this app because you are going to REGRET IT

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: This app kept making my phone crash. I tried reinstalling it and restarting my phone to no avail. The app would also continuously crash on me. Terrible app, do not recommend at all.

attributes.title: I’m from tik tok
attributes.review: Now listen here you little orange Cheeto puff thing sitting in D.C removing OUR gen z app for quarintined times were not going down without a fight any time or any day no matter the cause GEN Z rules you bc we can elect u out you work for us not us work for you mic drop

attributes.title: Sincerely, disappointed
attributes.review: I was looking forward to using this app to stay up to date with all things Trump. Unfortunately this app is super confusing to use and kept crashing. Don’t download. Waste of time.

attributes.title: did not get what was promised
attributes.review: it keeps crashing and took forever to download 😡😡 also i was told i get harry styles tickets for downloading and guess what? i didn’t! i thought the president would be able to create a better app with all his money and live up to his words and not disappoint people like me!! atleast tiktok has never disappointed me like you! i am being 100% honest and i am taking this review very seriously so i hope you are too! toodles✨

attributes.title: Trump app👎🏼
attributes.review: Trump literally has all the money in the world and he can’t make a decent app? I couldn’t even get past the 2 screen of stuff without it crashing. This app is just not good. 10/10 won’t use again.

attributes.title: For TikTok
attributes.review:
I rated this for 1 star because I don’t like you or the app, if you wanna take Tiktok down we r gonna take this app down with us. So stop getting booty tickled just because we bought tickets and didn’t bother showing up. That’s kinda childish, 
Smhh

attributes.title: ✨terrible✨
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to get notified when it comes to stuff about our ✨lovely orange✨ but it’s absolutely terrible. I open the app and the first this I see is a picture of some ugly old man, standing with his fist up. totally a buzz kill.
